explains: n. 重要位置，最前沿；（思考、关注的）重心

sentences.en: They have been at the forefront of the campaign for political change.
sentences.cn: 他们一直处于政治变革运动的前沿。

sentences.en: The new product took the company to the forefront of the computer software field.
sentences.cn: 该新产品使这家公司跻身计算机软件业的前列。

sentences.en: You are really on the forefront.
